data.actual_result: The message, after the point where slowmode ended, is in low caps
data.short_description: If you have CAPS LOCK on while being on slowmode, that mode will reset upon the expiration of the slowmode limit
data.steps_to_repro: - Go in a channel with slowmode enabled - Enable CAPS LOCK and type in CAPS until the little timer expires - continue typing some more - observe the case
